div.div: Θόων : (1) a Phaeacian, Od. 8.113.—(2) son of Phaenops, a Trojan, slain by Diomed, Il. 5.152.—(3) a Trojan slain by Odysseus, Il. 11.422.—(4) a Trojan, comrade of Asius, slain by Antilochus, Il. 12.140, Il. 13.545.
From A Homeric Dictionary (Georg Autenrieth, New York, Harper and Brothers, 1891)
